In England, in the seven days to 18 June, there were 55,389 new confirmed cases (98.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 11 June, there were 40,993 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 35% (14,396 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 23 June is 4,066,294 (7,224.2 cases per 100,000 population).
